derivation: a primitive root; or perhaps a denominative from H2947 (טֵפַח), from dandling on the palms
outline:
1. to extend, spread, trip, take quick little steps
    1. (Piel)
      1. to spread out
      2. to carry on the palms, dandle
      3. to rear children
strongs_def: to flatten out or extend (as a tent); figuratively, to nurse achild (as promotive of growth);
